common.cookieDescription: Link uses essential cookies to keep things running smoothly. If you accept, we may also use your approximate location to show nearby services and improve recommendations. By accepting, you agree to this use. For more details, see our Privacy Notice.

auth.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters and include uppercase, lowercase, number, and symbol.
auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter your email to receive a reset link.
auth.resetEmailSent: Check your inbox for a password reset link.
auth.resetEmailSentDescription: Password reset link has been sent to your email.
auth.enterEmailToReset: Enter your email address and we'll send you a password reset link.
auth.checkEmailForReset: Check your email ({{email}}) for a password reset link.
auth.resetLinkExpires: The link will expire in 24 hours.
auth.resetEmailError: Failed to send reset email. Please try again.
auth.verifyEmailSent: Verification email sent. Please check your inbox before logging in.
auth.verifyEmailDescription: Please verify your email to unlock all features.

errors.emailInUse: This email is already registered. Try logging in instead.
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.weakPassword: Password should be at least 6 characters.
errors.operationNotAllowed: Email/password sign up is not enabled.
errors.userNotFound: No account found with this email.
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.emailNotVerified: Please verify your email before logging in.

onboarding.chooseRole: How would you like to use Link?
onboarding.clientDescription: Find and book trusted female service providers in your area
onboarding.providerDescription: Offer your services and grow your business

booking.validationError: Please select date, time, and location.

bookings.cancelConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking? This action cannot be undone.
bookings.cancelConfirmDescProvider: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking? The client will be notified.
bookings.completeConfirmDesc: Confirm that you have completed this service. The client will be notified.

chat.startChat: Start a conversation by booking a service
chat.startConversation: Send a message to start the conversation
chat.chatsWillAppear: Chats with clients will appear here
chat.imageTooLarge: Image is too large. Maximum size is 5MB.

profile.logoutDescription: Are you sure you want to log out of your account?
profile.completePercent: You have completed {{percent}}% of your profile

booking.title: Booking & cancellations
items: View or reschedule your bookings from the Bookings tab.
Cancellations may be subject to the provider’s policy.
Contact the provider if you need to adjust timing.

payments.title: Payments & payouts
items: Prices are shown before you confirm a booking.
Providers receive payouts after service completion.

account.title: Account & profile
items: Keep your profile updated for better matches.
Use Reset Password if you can’t log in.
You can change language from Profile settings.

safety.title: Safety & disputes
items: Use in-app chat to keep records of agreements.
Report issues promptly to help resolve disputes.
Only meet in safe, agreed locations.

messaging.title: Messaging
items: Chat is available after a booking is created.
Notifications can be managed in Profile preferences.

faqs.q: How do I find nearby services?
faqs.a: Enable location access and sort by Nearest in Search filters.
Yes, open the booking to reschedule or message the provider.

faqs.q: How do I change my password?
faqs.a: Go to Profile and select Reset password.

wallet.pendingNote: Funds from recent bookings (released after 48 hours)
wallet.payoutDescription: Enter the amount you want to withdraw to your bank account.
wallet.payoutWarning: Payouts typically take 1-3 business days to process.

services.noServices: You haven't added any services yet
services.profileIncompleteDescription: Add your phone, region, city, district, and bio before creating services.
services.verificationRequiredDescription: Please complete verification before creating services.
services.title: Service title
services.durationHint: How long does this service typically take?
services.validationError: Please fill all required fields correctly.
services.deleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the service.

chat.startChat: Start a conversation by booking a service
chat.startConversation: Send a message to start the conversation
chat.chatsWillAppear: Conversations with clients will appear here

landing.heroSubtitle: Discover and book verified female service providers in your city. Safe, easy, and reliable.

admin.usersDescription: View and manage all users in the platform
admin.suspendDescription: Are you sure you want to suspend {{name}}? They won't be able to access their account.
admin.activateDescription: Are you sure you want to activate {{name}}? They will regain access to their account.
admin.verificationsDescription: Review and approve provider verification requests
admin.approveDescription: Are you sure you want to approve {{name}} as a verified provider?
admin.rejectDescription: Are you sure you want to reject {{name}}'s verification request?
admin.rejectionReasonPlaceholder: Explain why this verification was rejected...
admin.payoutsDescription: Process and manage provider payout requests
admin.approvePayoutDescription: Approve payout of {{amount}} to provider's bank account.
admin.markPaidDescription: Confirm that {{amount}} has been sent to the provider's bank account.
admin.payoutRejectionPlaceholder: Explain why this payout was rejected...
admin.categoriesSeedHint: Add the default categories so clients can browse services.
admin.searchProviders: Search by provider name or email...
admin.lockAccountMessage: Are you sure you want to lock this provider's account? They will not be able to accept bookings or manage their services.
admin.unlockAccountMessage: Are you sure you want to unlock this provider's account? They will regain access to their account.

dashboard.requestsWillAppear: New booking requests will appear here
dashboard.acceptDescription: Are you sure you want to accept this booking request?
dashboard.rejectDescription: Are you sure you want to reject this booking request?

provider.accountLockedMessage: Your account is locked due to expired subscription. You cannot accept bookings or manage services until you renew your subscription.
provider.subscriptionExpiredMessage: Your subscription has expired. Please renew it to continue using the platform.
provider.subscriptionExpiringMessage: Your subscription expires in {{days}} days. Renew now to avoid service disruption.

subscription.bankTransferDesc: Transfer funds directly to our bank account
subscription.cardPaymentDesc: Pay with debit or credit card (coming soon)
subscription.contactAdminDesc: For payment inquiries or to complete your subscription, please reach out to us:
subscription.responseTime: Our team typically responds within 2-4 hours during business hours (8 AM - 8 PM GST)
subscription.noteDesc: Your subscription will activate immediately after payment is verified. You'll receive a confirmation email with your receipt.
